item.title: Logging
item.description: Logging with SpikeKit is powered by Winston. This allows us to selectively log things that happen and better respond to errors in Spike. Do not use console.log or console.error to log messages. Instead, use one of the log levels below with the SpikeKit logger. Log Levels Log levels in SpikeKit go along with npm convention. Here are the log levels we use, in order of highest to lowest priority: Level Function Call Meaning Error spikeKit.
